title: PUBG
description: PUBG Mobile is a fast-paced battle royale game where players fight for survival, strategy, and victory on dynamic maps.

title: Fortnite
description: Fortnite is a global phenomenon battle royale that combines shooting, building and live events in a stylised world.

title: Minecraft
description: Minecraft is a sandbox game where players create, explore and survive in endless block-based worlds of their own making.

title: League of Legends
description: League of Legends is a 5v5 multiplayer online battle arena game where teams strategise and fight to destroy the enemy Nexus.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: GTA V is an open world game where players switch between three characters in a sprawling city, engaging in missions, heists, and exploration.

title: Call of Duty
description: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II is a fast-paced first-person shooter offering mission-based campaign, multiplayer and co-op modes.

title: Apex Legends
description: Apex Legends is a hero-based battle royale where squads of three choose unique characters and battle across evolving maps.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Breath of the Wild is an open world adventure game where Link explores a huge landscape to free Hyrule from evil forces.

title: Pokémon
description: Pokémon Scarlet & Violet are open-world Pokémon RPGs where trainers explore new regions, catch Pokémon and battle in multiplayer.

title: Animal Crossing
description: Animal Crossing: New Horizons is a life-sim where you build and decorate your island, interact with villagers and enjoy a relaxing multiplayer experience.
